patterns: What do you know about Yanko?

responses: Yanko is Junior Software developer with experience in BackEnd, FrontEnd, DevOps.Also is graduated Naval Architect with master degree and twelve years solid experience in the shipbuilding industry.

responses: Tech stack of Yanko: Python, Django, Docker, Terraform, PostgreSQL, GitHub, Azure, HTML, CSS, Flask, Linux, Prometheus, Alertmanager, Grafana.
Yanko have skills with Python, Django, Docker, Terraform, PostgreSQL, GitHub, Azure, HTML, CSS, Flask, Linux, Prometheus, Alertmanager, Grafana.
Yanko gained experience with Python, Django, Docker, Terraform, PostgreSQL, GitHub, Azure, HTML, CSS, Flask, Linux, Prometheus, Alertmanager, Grafana.
From more than year and half, Yanko is studying Python. Learned data types, OOP, Design Patterns, SOLID principles, Python Libraries, Unit Testing.
With Django, Yanko gained experience with FBV, CVB, ORM, MVT, MVC, signals, django principles, django template language. CURD, back end, serverside.
With Docker, Yanko gained experience to build images ,containers, to orchestrate containers with docker compose. Deploy images using Azure CLI and Docker CLI.
With Terraform, Yanko have skills to Build configurations for building and deploy apps. Also gained experience to build CI/CD & Azure configurations.
With PostgreSQL, Yanko have experience to build DB with docker and to use it with ORM. CRUD on db tables.
